photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user account was created.

ChatSession.title: Chat Session
ChatSession.description: Represents a single conversational session with the AI assistant.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this chat session.

title.description: A short, auto-generated title for the session (e.g., the first user prompt).

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the session was started.

history.description: An array of chat messages representing the conversation history.

role.description: The role of the message sender.

content.description: The text content of the message.

FileItem.title: File Item
FileItem.description: Metadata for a file, initially for the mock file system, later for Google Drive.

name.description: The name of the file or folder.

parentId.description: The ID of the parent folder ('root' for top-level items).

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this file.

size.description: Size of the file in bytes.

EventData.title: Event Data
EventData.description: Represents a calendar event, reminder, or note created by the user.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this event.

start.description: The start date and time of the event.

end.description: The end date and time of the event.

isAllDay.description: Flag indicating if it's an all-day event.

notes.description: Additional notes or description for the event.

/chats/{sessionId}.description: Stores individual chat sessions with the AI assistant.

/files/{fileId}.description: Stores metadata for user files and folders.

/events/{eventId}.description: Stores calendar events, reminders, and notes.
